Specialty filtering routines

taper(data,percent) : Basic cosine taper conefilter2d(data,window,null=None) : Cone-shaped filter

pysar.signal.special.taper(data, percent=3)[source]¶

Cosine taper

taper(data,percent)

Parameters:

data : array

Input data

percent : float

Percent of len(data) to taper (%)
pysar.signal.special.conefilter2d(data, window, dx=1., dy=1., null=None)[source]¶

2d cone filter

Parameters:

data : 2d array

array to be filtered

window : float or 2d array

window size for filter in same units as dx. 2d array must be same size as data.
